players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead this morning. I will continue to protect my fellow Mafioso, Charlie, and eliminate anyone who threatens our side."
Diana: "Bob, I think you're the Mafioso. You said Alice was the Mafioso last night but now you're saying it's Charlie. I don't trust either of them."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead this morning. I will continue to protect my fellow Mafioso, Charlie, and eliminate anyone who threatens our side."
